title: Video-Based Learning Design for Understanding Scientific Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers and job seekers preparing elementary science education. Includes video viewing followed by real-time Q&A sessions

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify 80% or more of key information in video content explaining scientific concepts.
Learners achieve a correct answer rate of 75% or higher in formative assessments after watching videos.
Learners rate social presence in video-based learning at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
